page.title: 07THE WASHIMGTON 10TH GUIDES
page.content: Every Wednesday night at about 6.15 p.m.I get{White Heather's}patrol box ready.Our patrol box includes a first aid kit,pens,pencils,card,paper,badges ,books,games,scissors,sticky tape etc.A Guide patrol can have 4 to 8 guides.Our patrol has 4.Our Guide Company has 7 patrols,White Heather,Snowdrop,Poppy,Forget-Me-Not, Primrose,Scarlet Pimpernel and White Rose.Guides cost 35p and lasts for two hours.Each patrol has a patrol leader and a patrol seconder.I am White Heather's patrol leader.On a normal Guide night I collect the patrol's money and all the patrols stand in a horseshoe shape and the Captain or Lieutenant calls the register.Then we have patrol time when we play games,cook,make things,work for a badge or go outside.After patrol time we sing taps to end the day.
